description: 'Top Gun: Maverick' is an upcoming American military action drama film directed by Joseph Kosinski. It is the sequel to the 1986 film, 'Top Gun'. The film stars Tom Cruise, Val Kilmer and Miles Teller. It will be released to the general audience on May 27, 2022.

markets.description:
'Top Gun: Maverick' is an upcoming American military action drama film directed by Joseph Kosinski. It is the sequel to the 1986 film, 'Top Gun'. The film stars Tom Cruise, Val Kilmer and Miles Teller. It will be released to the general audience on May 27, 2022.

This market will resolve to 'Yes' if, when checked on the resolution date, the 'Top Gun: Maverick' movie will have an 85% or higher Tomatometer rating at Rotten Tomatoes, and 'No' otherwise.

The resolution source (Tomatometer All Critics Score rating at Rotten Tomatoes' movie profile: https://www.rottentomatoes.com/m/top_gun_maverick) for this market will be checked on the resolution date - June 1 2022 at 12:00 PM ET.

---------------

Rotten Tomatoes' Tomatometer is the percentage of all Approved Tomatometer Critics who have given this movie a positive review.

If for any reason the resolution data is unavailable, the resolution source will be checked every 12 hours, until the actual data is available. If the data is not available on the resolution source by June 8 2022, 12:00 PM ET, this market will resolve to 50/50.
markets.question: Will 'Top Gun: Maverick' get an 85% or higher Tomatometer Score?

markets.description:
In Response to Trader Inquiry: The resolution source for this market will be the Box Office Mojo number under Domestic Weekend for the 4-day weekend, regardless of whether domestic refers to just the USA or the USA and Canada, etc.

'Top Gun: Maverick' is an upcoming American military action drama film directed by Joseph Kosinski. It is the sequel to the 1986 film, 'Top Gun'. The film stars Tom Cruise, Val Kilmer and Miles Teller. It will be released on May 27, 2022.

This is a market on how much ‘Top Gun: Maverick' will gross domestically (in the USA) on the 4-day opening weekend. The 4-day opening weekend for this market is defined as the long weekend of Friday, Saturday, Sunday and Monday (U.S. Memorial Day) after the film's release - May 27 to May 30. The “Domestic Weekend” tab on https://www.boxofficemojo.com/release/rl2500036097/ will resolve this market once the values for the 4-day weekend (May 27-30) are final (i.e. not studio estimates).

This market will resolve to "Yes" if 'Top Gun: Maverick' grossed $100,000,000 or more on the 4-day opening weekend. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If there is no final data available by June 6, 2022, 11:59:59 PM ET, another credible source will be chosen and looked at.
markets.groupItemTitle: $100 million or more gross on 4-day Memorial Weekend?
markets.question: Will ‘Top Gun: Maverick’ gross $100 million or more on the 4-day Memorial Weekend domestically?
